title: Machining and Processing of Engineering Materials
detectedTitle: Machining and Processing of Engineering Materials

learningOutcomes.description: Explore the conventional machining, additive manufacture and forming processes and their application in the production of engineered components
Explain how component materials, metals and non-metals, affect the selection of the most appropriate machining or forming process
Examine the most appropriate machine tooling, jigs and fixtures to support the production of an engineered component
Discuss the most appropriate moulding and shaping process used to produce a range of metal and non-metal engineered components.
